name: Reversinglabs TitaniumCloud v2
description: App integrates with ReversingLabs TitaniumCloud APIs delivering targeted file and malware intelligence for threat identification, analysis, intelligence development, and threat hunting services

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
actions.verbose: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration.

actions.description: TCA-0303 - Create a new YARA ruleset
actions.verbose: TCA-0303 - Create a new YARA ruleset.

ruleset_text.description: Stringified YARA ruleset / a Unicode string
ruleset_text.name: ruleset_text

actions.verbose: TCA-0303 - Get information for a specific YARA ruleset or all YARA rulesets in the collection.
TCA-0303 - Get the text of a YARA ruleset.

output.description: TCA-0303 - Get a recordset of YARA ruleset matches in the specified time range
output.verbose: TCA-0303 - Get a recordset of YARA ruleset matches in the specified time range.

output.description: TCA-0319 - Enable YARA retro hunt
output.verbose: TCA-0319 - Enable the retro hunt for the specified ruleset that has been submitted to TitaniumCloud prior to deployment of YARA retro.

output.description: TCA-0319 - Start YARA retro hunt for the specified ruleset
output.verbose: TCA-0319 - Start YARA retro hunt for the specified ruleset.

output.description: TCA-0319 - Check the retro hunt status for the specified ruleset
output.verbose: TCA-0319 - Check the retro hunt status for the specified ruleset.

output.description: TCA-0319 - Cancel the retro hunt for the specified ruleset
output.verbose: TCA-0319 - Cancel the retro hunt for the specified ruleset.

output.description: TCA-0319 - Get a recordset of YARA ruleset matches in the specified time range
output.verbose: TCA-0319 - Get a recordset of YARA ruleset matches in the specified time range.

output.description: TCA-0302 - Get a a list of all available SHA1 hashes for files sharing the same import hash (imphash)
output.verbose: TCA-0302 - Imphash Index provides a list of all available SHA1 hashes for files sharing the same import hash (imphash). An imphash is a hash calculated from a string which contains the libraries imported by a Windows Portable Executable (PE) file.

output.description: TCA-0320 - Search for hashes using multi-part search criteria
output.verbose: TCA-0320 - Search for hashes using multi-part search criteria. Supported criteria include more than 60 keywords, 35 antivirus vendors, 137 sample types and subtypes, and 283 tags that enable creating 510 unique search expressions with support for Boolean operators and case-insensitive wildcard matching. A number of search keywords support relational operators '<=' and '>='.

output.description: TCA-0103 - Retrieve AV Scanner data from TitaniumCloud
output.verbose: TCA-0103 - Provides AV vendor cross-reference data for a desired sample from multiple AV scanners.

output.description: TCA-0101 - Queries for file reputation info
output.verbose: TCA-0101 - Queries for file reputation info.

output.description: TCA-0104 - Retrieve File Analysis by hash data from TitaniumCloud
output.verbose: TCA-0104 - Provides file analysis data on hashes. Metadata can include relevant portions of static analysis, AV scan information, file sources and any related IP/domain information.

output.description: TCA-0301 - Retrieve a list of functionally similar hashes to the provided one
output.verbose: TCA-0301 - Provides a list of SHA1 hashes of files that are functionally similar to the provided file (SHA1 hash) at the selected precision level.

output.description: TCA-0403 - Queries URL Threat Intelligence
output.verbose: TCA-0403 - Queries URL Threat Intelligence.

output.description: TCA - 0403 - Get files downloaded from url
output.verbose: Accepts a URL string and returns a list of downloaded files aggregated through multiple pages of results.

classification.description: Return only files of this classification
classification.name: classification

last_analysis.description: Return only files from the last analysis
last_analysis.name: last_analysis

analysis_id.description: Return only files from this analysis
analysis_id.name: analysis_id

results_per_page.description: Number of results to be returned in one page, maximum value is 1000
results_per_page.name: results_per_page

max_results.description: Maximum results to be returned in the list
max_results.name: max_results

output.description: TCA - 0403 - Get latest url analysis feed
output.verbose: Returns the latest URL analyses reports aggregated as list.

results_per_page.description: Number of results to be returned in one page, maximum value is 1000
results_per_page.name: results_per_page

max_results.description: Maximum results to be returned in the list
max_results.name: max_results

output.action: get url analysis feed from date
output.description: TCA - 0403 - Get url analysis feed from date
output.verbose: Accepts time format and a start time and returns URL analyses report from that defined time onward aggregated as a list.

start_time.description: Time from which to retrieve results onwards. Needs to be less than 90 days from now
Time from which to retrieve results onwards. Needs to be less than 90 days from now
start_time.name: start_time

results_per_page.description: Number of results to be returned in one page, maximum value is 1000
results_per_page.name: results_per_page

max_results.description: Maximum results to be returned in the list
max_results.name: max_results

render.title: TitaniumCloud Url Analysis Feed From Date

output.description: TCA-0404 - Analyze a given URL
output.verbose: TCA-0404 - This service allows users to submit a URL for analysis.

output.description: TCA-0402 - Retrieve the number of MALICIOUS, SUSPICIOUS and KNOWN files associated with a specific URI
output.verbose: TCA-0402 - Provides the number of MALICIOUS, SUSPICIOUS and KNOWN files associated with a specific URI (domain, IP address, email or URL).

output.description: TCA-0401 - Retrieve a list of all available file hashes associated with a given URI
output.verbose: TCA-0401 - Provides a list of all available file hashes associated with a given URI (domain, IP address, email or URL) regardless of file classification.

output.description: TCA-0207 - Submit an existing sample for dynamic analysis
output.verbose: TCA-0207 - This service allows users to detonate a file in the ReversingLabs TitaniumCloud sandbox. To submit a file for analysis, it must exist in TitaniumCloud.

platform.description: Selected platform on which the analysis will be performed. See TCA-0207 API documentation for available options
platform.name: platform

output.description: TCA-0207 - Submit an url sample for dynamic analysis
output.verbose: TCA-0207 - This service allows users to analyze a url in the ReversingLabs TitaniumCloud sandbox. To submit an url for analysis, it must exist in TitaniumCloud.

platform.description: Selected platform on which the analysis will be performed. See TCA-0207 API documentation for available options
platform.name: platform

output.description: TCA-0106 - Retrieve dynamic analysis results
output.verbose: TCA-0106 - This service allows users to retrieve dynamic analysis results for a file that was submitted for dynamic analysis.

analysis_id.description: Return only the results of this analysis
analysis_id.name: analysis_id

latest.description: Return only the latest analysis results
latest.name: latest

output.description: TCA-0106 - Retrieve dynamic analysis results for url
output.verbose: TCA-0106 - This service allows users to retrieve dynamic analysis results for an url that was submitted for dynamic analysis.

url.description: Provide one of the following: sha1, base64 or url
url.name: url

analysis_id.description: Return only the results of this analysis
analysis_id.name: analysis_id

latest.description: Return only the latest analysis results
latest.name: latest

render.title: TitaniumCloud Get Dynamic Analysis Results for URL

output.description: TCA-0205 - Reanalyze sample
output.verbose: TCA-0205 - This query sends a sample with the requested hash for rescanning.

output.description: TCA-0202 - Upload file to TitaniumCloud
output.verbose: TCA-0202 - Upload file to TitaniumCloud.

vault_id.description: Vault ID of file to upload
vault_id.name: vault_id

output.description: TCA-0201 - Download a sample from TitaniumCloud
output.verbose: TCA-0201 - Download a sample from TitaniumCloud and add it to the vault.

output.description: Network Reputation API
output.verbose: Service provides information regarding the reputation of a requested URL, domain, or IP address.

output.description: List User Overrides
output.verbose: The Network Reputation User Override service enables URL classification overrides. Any URL can be overridden to malicious, suspicious, or known.

output.description: Returns a list of overrides that the user has made
output.verbose: This API automatically handles paging and returns a list of results instead of a Response object.

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to be returned in the list
max_results.name: max_results

output.description: Network Reputation User Override
output.verbose: The Network Reputation User Override service enables URL classification overrides.

override_list.description: List of network locations whose classification needs to be overriden structured in JSON format. Visit documentation for guidance
List of network locations whose classification needs to be overriden structured in JSON format. Visit documentation for guidance
override_list.name: override_list

remove_overrides_list.description: List of network locations whose classification override needs to be removed structured in JSON format. Visit documentation for guidance
List of network locations whose classification override needs to be removed structured in JSON format. Visit documentation for guidance
remove_overrides_list.name: remove_overrides_list

output.description: File Reputation User Override
output.verbose: The File Reputation User Override service enables File sample classification overrides.

override_samples.description: List of samples to override structured in JSON format. Visit documentation for guidance
override_samples.name: override_samples

remove_overrides.description: List of samples whose classification override needs to be removed structured in JSON format. Visit documentation for guidance
remove_overrides.name: remove_overrides

output.action: list active file reputation user overrides
output.description: List Active File Reputation User Overrides
output.verbose: The File Reputation User Override service enables sample classification overrides. Any sample can be overridden to malicious, suspicious, or known.

hash_type.description: Required parameter that defines the type of hash
hash_type.name: hash_type

start_hash.description: When this parameter is present, the API will return up to 1000 hashes with a classification override starting from the start_hash value
start_hash.name: start_hash

output.description: Check daily usage of ReversingLabs API
output.verbose: API allows ReversingLabs customers to track the usage of TitaniumCloud services provisioned to all accounts in a company.

date.description: Specifies the date for which customer usage information should be returned. Users can submit one value per request in the YYYY-MM-DD format.
date.name: date

company.description: When this parameter is checked, the API will return usage for all accounts within the company
company.name: company

output.description: Check ReversingLabs API usage for specified time range (in days)
output.verbose: API allows ReversingLabs customers to track the usage of TitaniumCloud services provisioned to all accounts in a company.

from_date.description: Specifies the from date for which customer usage information should be returned. Users can submit one value per request in the YYYY-MM-DD format
from_date.name: from_date

to_date.description: Specifies the to date for which customer usage information should be returned. Users can submit one value per request in the YYYY-MM-DD format
to_date.name: to_date

company.description: When this parameter is checked, the API will return usage for all accounts within the company
company.name: company

output.description: Check Monthly usage of ReversingLabs API
output.verbose: API allows ReversingLabs customers to track the usage of TitaniumCloud services provisioned to all accounts in a company.

month.description: Specifies the month for which customer usage information should be returned. Users can submit one value per request in the YYYY-MM format
month.name: month

company.description: When this parameter is checked, the API will return usage for all accounts within the company
company.name: company

output.description: Check ReversingLabs API usage for specified time range (in months)
output.verbose: API allows ReversingLabs customers to track the usage of TitaniumCloud services provisioned to all accounts in a company.

from_month.description: Specifies the from date for which customer usage information should be returned. Users can submit one value per request in the YYYY-MM format
from_month.name: from_month

to_month.description: Specifies the to date for which customer usage information should be returned. Users can submit one value per request in the YYYY-MM format
to_month.name: to_month

company.description: When this parameter is checked, the API will return usage for all accounts within the company
company.name: company

output.description: Check Yara usage on ReversingLabs API
output.verbose: This query returns information about the number of active YARA rulesets for the TitaniumCloud account that sent the request.

format.description: Specify the response format. Supported values are xml and json. The default is JSON
format.name: format

output.description: Returns current quota limits for APIs accessible to the authenticated user or users belonging to the authenticated user's company
output.verbose: API allows ReversingLabs customers to track quota limits of TitaniumCloud services provisioned to all accounts in a company.

company.description: When this parameter is checked, the API will return quota limits for all accounts within the company
company.name: company

output.description: API returns threat intelligence data for the submitted domain
output.verbose: The report contains domain reputation from various reputation sources, classification statistics for files downloaded from the domain, the most common threats found on the domain DNS information about the domain, and parent domain information.

domain.description: The domain for which to retrieve the report
domain.name: domain

output.description: Retrieve a list of files downloaded from the submitted domain
output.verbose: The response will contain metadata for files downloaded from the submitted domain. Empty fields are not included in the response.

domain.description: The domain for which to retrieve the downloaded files
domain.name: domain

extended.description: Chose whether you want extended result data set
extended.name: extended

limit.description: The number of files to return in the response. Default is 1000
limit.name: limit

classification.description: Return only samples that match the requested classification for given domain
classification.name: classification

output.description: API provides a list of URLs associated with the requested domain
output.verbose: API provides a list of URLs associated with the requested domain.

domain.description: The domain for which to retrieve the resolved IP addresses
domain.name: domain

page.description: String representing a page of results
page.name: page

limit.description: The number of files to return in the response. Default is 1000
limit.name: limit

output.description: API provides a list of domain-to-IP mappings for the requested domain
output.verbose: API provides a list of domain-to-IP mappings for the requested domain.

domain.description: The domain for which to retrieve the domain to IP mappings
domain.name: domain

page.description: String representing a page of results
page.name: page

limit.description: The number of files to return in the response. Default is 1000
limit.name: limit

output.description: API provides a list of domains that have the same top parent domain as the requested domain
output.verbose: API provides a list of domains that have the same top parent domain as the requested domain. If the requested domain is a top parent domain, the API will return all subdomains.

domain.description: The domain for which to retrieve the downloaded files
domain.name: domain

page.description: String representing a page of results
page.name: page

limit.description: The number of files to return in the response. Default is 1000
limit.name: limit

output.description: API returns threat intelligence data for the submitted ip address
output.verbose: The report contains IP reputation from various reputation sources, classification statistics for files downloaded from the IP, and the top threats hosted on the submitted IP.

ip_address.description: The IP address for which to retrieve the report
ip_address.name: ip_address

output.verbose: The response will contain metadata for files downloaded from the submitted IP address. Empty fields are not included in the response.

ip_address.description: The IP address for which to retrieve the downloaded files
ip_address.name: ip_address

extended.description: Chose whether you want extended result data set
extended.name: extended

page.description: String representing a page of results
page.name: page

limit.description: The number of files to return in the response. Default is 1000
limit.name: limit

classification.name: classification

ip_address.description: The IP for which to retrieve the domain resolutions
ip_address.name: ip_address

page.description: String representing a page of results
page.name: page

limit.name: limit
